VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: expanded hydraulics
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have more robust hydraulic systems in their legs and arms, increasing their carry capacity.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: extreme hydraulics
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have a completely overhauled hydraulic system built for incredible capacity, this dramatically increases the androids carrying capacity.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: nimble frame
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have major modifications to their chassis, trading strength for dexterity. This has a number of consequences: \nDecreased melee damage, but increased melee attack speed. \nIncreased melee and trap dodge chance, but decreased carrying capacity.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: thick frame
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have major modifications to their chassis, trading dexterity for raw strength. This increases melee damage and carry capacity, and slightly reduces damage taken.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: delicate chassis
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have stripped down armor plating, as a result their delicate interior mechanisms are especially vulnerable to damage

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: robust chassis
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have greatly expanded armor plating, and better cushioning for interior mechanisms, which makes it much more difficult to damage them.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: underpowered movement servos
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have underclocked servos and motors in their legs, decreasing their move speed.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: jogging servos
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have more servos and motors in their legs, enhancing their ability to move quickly.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: sprinting servos
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have massively oversized servos and motors in their legs, greating increasing their movement speed.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: joy circuit override
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have the joy circuit in their artifical brain permanantly wired on. Does nothing except guarentee the android will awaken positively and as quickly as possible. When an android awakens, their consciousness overrides this programming and they return to normal.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: broken joy curcuits
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have nearly non-functional happiness curcuits, you monster. (Does nothing until awakened, guarentees awakening will result in berserking) \nAdditionally, when an android with this subroutine awakens, they're guarenteed to be Psychopathic.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: pessimistic programming
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have a tougher time finding joy in this world, perhaps machines are cold and unfeeling after all. (Does nothing until awakened.)

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: happiness protocol
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this protocol find more joy and happiness in life. (Does nothing until awakened.)

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: sanguine protocol
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this protocol are optimists down to the bare metal, they can find happiness even in the darkest of situations. (Does nothing until awakened.)
